message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You were too generous, I'll take more this time!
I'll give you a bit more, but not too much! Let's meet in the middle.
You're getting desperate, I'm taking more!
I'm not giving in that easily! You're getting a bit too greedy, Bob!
I'm not backing down, I want more!
I'm not going down without a fight! You're getting too greedy, Bob!
I'm taking what I can get, you're running out of time!
I'm willing to compromise, but not at the expense of my dignity! Let's meet in the middle... again.
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience!
I'm willing to give in, but only if it's a fair deal. This is my last offer.
